*For some transitive vulnerabilities, there is no version of direct dependency with a fix. Check the "Details" section below to see if there is a version of transitive dependency where vulnerability is fixed.

## Details
CVE-2022-41723 ### Vulnerable Library - golang.org/x/net-v0.5.0

Library home page: https://proxy.golang.org/golang.org/x/net/@v/v0.5.0.zip

Dependency Hierarchy: - go.temporal.io/api-v1.16.0 (Root Library) - google.golang.org/grpc-v1.52.3 - :x: **golang.org/x/net-v0.5.0** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: 8bf5c60f2589d31108d22a338800a4bcb4c42f3f

Found in base branch: main

### Vulnerability Details

A maliciously crafted HTTP/2 stream could cause excessive CPU consumption in the HPACK decoder, sufficient to cause a denial of service from a small number of small requests.

Publish Date: 2023-02-28

URL: CVE-2022-41723

### CVSS 3 Score Details (7.5)

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

Fix Resolution: v0.7.0
